posts.post_content:
1/3/13

Raw T206 cards. Scans are numbered so you can see which backs go with which fronts.
Previous cards are FS here -
 [url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=160326[/url]
and here
[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=160682[/url]
Shipping is $2 for a single card, $5 for groups.
I would prefer communication through PM's on this site.
I will not be at the computer for the next day and a half so it might be two days before I respond to PM's.
